title: Fed officials were divided on whether to cut rates by half a point in September, minutes show
content: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday releases minutes from its Sept. 17-18 policy meeting.
summary: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday releases minutes from its Sept. 17-18 policy meeting.

title: Nvidia shares are up 25% in the last month, rallying near a record ahead of tech earnings
content: Nvidia shares have surged 25% over the last month, with analysts maintaining a bullish outlook as earnings season approaches.
summary: Nvidia shares have surged 25% over the last month, with analysts maintaining a bullish outlook as earnings season approaches.

title: DOJ indicates it’s considering Google breakup following monopoly ruling
content: The Department of Justice late Tuesday indicated that it was considering a possible breakup of Google as an antitrust remedy.
summary: The Department of Justice late Tuesday indicated that it was considering a possible breakup of Google as an antitrust remedy.

title: Swedish battery maker Northvolt says head of Europe’s first homegrown gigafactory to step down
content: It comes shortly after the cash-strapped company announced plans to reduce its workforce by about 25% in Sweden as part of a major cost-cutting drive.
summary: It comes shortly after the cash-strapped company announced plans to reduce its workforce by about 25% in Sweden as part of a major cost-cutting drive.

title: OpenAI says bad actors are using its platform to disrupt elections, but with little 'viral engagement'

summary: OpenAI said in a report that it continues to see threat actors attempt to use its products, like ChatGPT, to influence election outcomes.

title: Warren Buffett's S&P 500 bet paid off. Experts weigh in on whether it's still a winning strategy
content: Investing in an S&P 500 index fund can let you take a set-it-and-forget-it approach. But some experts say you could be missing an opportunity to diversify.
summary: Investing in an S&P 500 index fund can let you take a set-it-and-forget-it approach. But some experts say you could be missing an opportunity to diversify.

title: As interest rates fall, it's a 'fantastic time' to revisit bonds, advisor says — here's why

title: TikTok's use of casino-like virtual currency to allegedly exploit children faces scrutiny in DC lawsuit

title: HSBC exec says there's a lot of AI 'success theater' happening in finance

title: Bayer shares drop 7% after U.S. court says it will review Monsanto case

title: CVS, UnitedHealth, Cigna say FTC should take Lina Khan and two commissioners off drug middlemen case

title: Ozempic underworld: Inside the black market of obesity drugs
content: A CNBC investigation into illegal weight loss drugs reveals a marketplace where criminals brazenly counterfeit the drugs or ship the real product from overseas.

title: Sweden's Volvo says deputy CEO to step down in management reshuffle as EV demand slows

title: Mining giant Rio Tinto to acquire Arcadium Lithium in $6.7 billion deal
content: The world's second-largest miner Rio Tinto said Wednesday it will acquire U.S. lithium producer Arcadium for $6.7 billion.
summary: The world's second-largest miner Rio Tinto said Wednesday it will acquire U.S. lithium producer Arcadium for $6.7 billion.

title: China's property stimulus raises optimism — but more steps are needed for a sectoral turnaround

title: Weekly mortgage demand drops as interest rates hit the highest level since August

title: Left and right prey on weak French government as it prepares 'austerity' budget

title: CNBC Daily Open: Opportunity in October’s choppiness for stocks

title: New Zealand central bank slashes rates by 50 basis points in second straight rate cut

title: Boeing withdraws contract offer after talks with union end without a deal

title: Harris is borrowing from 'Republican playbook' as she leads Trump in new national poll
